评论详情: The top is so great, true to color, the material is the softest thing in this world. The neck is big enough not to bother you, looks great, got a lot of complements on it. I am 5"2' and it fit great just the right length not too long at all.
Went as Powerline for MNSSHP and this shirt was perfect. It is a bit thin, but it was hot as heck, so it was PERFECT!

The product is good and fit well, but it does run short. Usually I buy XL shirts because they give me extra room to move but this fits more like a large. If you don't mind the slightly cropped feel, it works great for he price, but I'm not the biggest fan. Would definitely size up next time.

This is very comfy. I almost bought the extra small one, but I'm glad I bought it in a medium. The color is absolutely beautiful. The material's pretty thin and I love it. It wasn't that expensive and I could wear this around the house while I wear a bra. It's amazing.

The shirt was cute and the fit was accurate.  It has a shorter length, not quite crop.  I did not like the fabric.  It was stiffer than I expected and slightly scratchy.  I'm super sensitive to fabric "feel," so others might find this a non-issue.

评论概述: Perfect for what I need it for… may buy more!
评论详情: The main purpose of me buying this shirt is actually for an Oogie boogie costume. I am making for when my family goes to Disney within the next two months. When I got the product, it fits me perfectly, I am 5’1” and 151 pounds at the moment. It’s light and will be good for hot, early fall Florida weather. The hood will be great to paint Oogie’s face on! Because I will be modifying this top for a costume, and because I like the way it fits and looks, I will most likely be buying others in different colors as well for normal wear!
Very impressed by the quality of this top!  Very soft, true to size and color is exactly as pictured online.
Great for a summer top, for yoga etc. Pretty color. VERY Light weight
Love the look and fit It arrived used with no tags and smelling like detergent but it’s fine, I just rewashed it. Will prob buy more in other colors
Good stretch; thickness of material was good; used this as a swim suit cover up/top

评论概述: not quite a hoodie aside from the aesthetic
评论详情: Love the style, was just expecting it to be like a sweatshirt material with sleeves cut off so I could feel like Rambo. Instead it is essentially just a shirt. Shorter than normal though I would recommend ordering a size up.
I am normally a xl. 173lb and 5'1. I ordered a xxl and it just did fit perfect. i love it and will order more colors.
Very cute, very comfy. I need it in a few more colors. It runs a bit small, so going a size up is a good idea.
Doesn’t seem to be the best quality for the price. Very thin and a bit see through. Still cute and will keep.

评论概述: Perfect for sporty or casual look!
评论详情: This is such a cute top. I love that it can be sporty or casual. It is a very soft material, but has shown some pilling and not being as soft over time and after washes. It’s long enough to be tucked in in the front but not too long. Lightweight and thin material so it is perfect for hot weather.
Smooth and great coverage.  Great skins match

It is so simple and so many people would love the style for its intended purpose. It is very difficult to find cool and practical workout tops. The loose flattering fit is a huge plus. Having tops close to the skin only makes you even warmer when you start to sweat.  I wore it to my gym and it kept me cooler while being stylish and attractive as well.  I bought two so far. I dropped a star because it is pricey.
Super cute shirt for exercising, nice and light material. Color was perfect Grey matching description. I am bummed it runs small. I am 44' across chest. And this is too tight.

I'm 5'4, 156lbs. Ordered a L even though Amazon said M. I did this because of reviews about it being a bit snug and short. The L is perfect, falls right at hip level with a little room, not baggy. Just perfect. Soft, cute, comfy.

评论概述: I'm obsessed with this neon tank top
评论详情: It fits perfectly (I'm 5'8", around 140 lbs and I bought a medium). Being tall with a long torso, I don't always love cropped tops, but something about the style of this shirt makes me love it! It is long enough that my stomach doesn't show (unless, of course, I stretch my arms way above my head). The neon pink is really pretty, and not as obnoxious as I thought it might be. I really pleased with it!
This top was exactly what I was looking for.  Ordered the khaki color but it's actual more peachy than khaki.  However, I plan on ordering more in a different colors.

I got the hoodie today and I think it’ll do great for my walks in the late afternoon. It looks great with just a sports bra but I might also pair it with some of my lightweight long sleeve tees once it starts to cool off. Texas doesn’t cool off until it’s nearly Christmas so I think I will get a lot of wear out of it. This is one that I’ll probably buy several colors in before the year ends.

评论概述: Hoping it still fits after the wash
评论详情: I ordered a medium and it fits just the way I hoped right out of the bag but I'm concerned it might shrink in the wash. We'll see! It's thin, which is also a plus in the scorching summer.
Cute, light weight,  true to size. It took a while to be delivered.

评论概述: Not dark grey marl as pictured
评论详情: The shirt I thought I was ordering was a grainy dark grey marl but a standard black arrived in the mail. Not really what I wanted as it looks a little cheap with the white drawstring and solid black.

Was super excited to order this.  Love the color and the light weight fabric for going to the gym.  However, it's more of a belly shirt, which I don't care for...In order to feel comfortable wearing it I'd have to put another shirt under it...which would be too hot.  Cute shirt just needed to be longer.  I still kept it though!

I love this little tank. It's flattering and lightweight and is exactly the style I was going for. I would recommend sizing up. I originally ordered a small and it was more form fitting than I wanted. I moved up to a Medium and it was loose enough to still give me some shape without being baggy.
I bought this for my summer job, we needed something bright and noticeable and this was perfect. The shirt is super lightweight without being cropped. And the hood is the best part
This is 100% a crop top. Cute. But not what was advertised. And not what I expected.

评论概述: Not all colors fit the same
评论详情: I have 3 of these already (gray, light gray, and red) - they all fit the same and are the perfect length (even after washing and drying). They fit right at the top of my hip (not too croppy, if you know what I mean). I just got the black in and as you can see from the photo, it’s about 2 inches shorter than the other colors I have. The black is definitely more of a crop top length. Very disappointed since I will be returning it. I would get this too in every color but now I worry they all won’t fit the same. I got lucky on 3. I really wanted it in black too!
It’s very breathable material and soft to the touch. I do wish it was a bit longer it’s more cropped then I like. I wear a high waisted pants with it and it’s perfect

I brought XL and sublimated on this tank and it took really well, I washed it a couple of times and it did not pill or bleed, I recommend for sublimation and just to wear also, the feel of the fabric is soft!

评论概述: Excellent COLOR SIZE COMFORT N DELIVERY…
评论详情: OMG I’m so happy I found this shirt! I’m usually between 108-120lbs 5”4-5”5-ish and I’m a pretty smaller framed person age in thee 40s lol not that that matters heehee 😉!! But when I received this shirt thee next day after placing this order I was like 👍 OMG 😳 REALLY!! I mean that was lighting fast 💨 right!! I got thee neon green and yup it’s def thee right neon and I was so happy to order something that not only looked like thee color stated but was super happy I was able to say sizing was dead on for me at least!!! I’d def say U won’t be disappointed with this item!!! I’m planning on buying a lot LOT more of these!!! They state diff styles and everything I can’t wait 😜!!! Thanks so much for my item N thanks Amazon for thee lighting delivery 🚚 U ALL ARE SUPER AMAZING 🤩!!!
Love the weight of the fabric!!  Very breathable!!

Highly recommend!  I’m 5’2” and have purchased this shirt in 8 colors - XS.  I live in Florida and this is my go to everyday shirt. I wear them with shorts & skorts. They look dressier than tees.  I do remove the hood strings as I don’t like look of them.  High quality material and they come out of the dryer wrinkle free.

It fits through shoulders and chest, but very short torso.  I can wear around the house, but wouldn't wear this to work or to socialize for fear a belly would show if I reached up even just a little. It's unfortunate because it's comfy and would have been fun to wear out in the summer.
This T-shirt is so soft and comfortable, and fits so well. I love it and my husband loves me in it.

评论用户: Janna Cowper | Hard of Hearing Mama
评论详情: I got this top to look a little cooler in open adult hip hop class. Lesson learned, stick to active wear. It is a bit heavy and sweaty for active purposes.  Otherwise it looks really nice and I'll be using it again in summer. It looks like though it may only last a few washes.
Super comfortable to work out in, or just wear around. If I had one complaint, I'd say I wish they were longer, but it's certainly not a deal breaker.

评论概述: Excessive pilling after a few hours in one spot
评论详情: I thought this was really comfy and liked the material and color but after wearing it for just a few hours noticed a lot of pilling. It must be defective or really cheap material.  I guess you get what you pay for.
Product is great, just as it shows. Material is very nice.

评论概述: Great Length True to Size fit
评论详情: No need to size up. I am typically a small and will size up to medium if I want something a bit loose.  I ordered this in a small and it was the perfect fit for me! Thin and lightweight. I am wearing a sports bra underneath.
I had this in my cart for sometime and decided to buy. It runs sooooo short - and I don’t have a long torso. Returning
This runs small order at least a size up. I got my usual size and mine is too small in the back.

I ordered two of these: green and a black w/ a heart. Black fits better. The green is much shorter. Too short for me. It just covers my stomach. For reference I am 5’7 & ordered a large. I do like the style.  I’ll wear it for my workouts.

This is a little bit longer style from this company as opposed to their cropped version. This hits right at or slightly below the waistline, depending on the length of your torso. Great for the gym or for casual everyday look.
It's exactly as it shows and my wife gets compliments on it when she wears it.
Cream color is see through and bags under the arms while fitting  everywhere else. Cute though and light weight so I will keep. Good length.
This tank top compares to Alo and AE tops. High quality and SO flattering. Not too short, not too long, washes perfectly and is super soft and comfortable.  I need more colors 😜
I love these cause I can use them on the sauna or the steam room cover my ears and water won’t get into my earbuds
The top is cute, but it runs smaller than my usual size. I will exchange for a size up. It is some what  cropped.
This top is exactly what I wanted.  Perfect weight, nice fit.  I am a mid-size woman and this top is sporty and flattering.  Wait why I am I telling you this before I snag all the colors?!
This is a very cute hoodie. Light weight and washes up very well. It’s a little short but I really like it.

These are super comfortable.  I’ve bought this in 4 or 5 colors already.  The only thing I would change is that the underarm opening not be as big - you either have to wear a matching bra or something under it because your bra will definitely show.

评论概述: This shirt is shorter then others
评论详情: The material is great it’s very comfortable but the length is to short
I got size Medium my regular size, it looks and fit nice, loose and hangs straight. Adorable!
Was perfect for the Halloween costume I had out together. Ended up returning as I chose a different direction. Arrived on time and was super cute.
Shirt is lightweight but not cheap looking

I actually like this top for the gym! It's cute, lightweight, and doesn't restrict movement. BUT, it fits like a crop top on me! I'm 5'8" with a longer torso. It looks cute with high waisted leggings, but I wasn't expecting it to be so short.
The quality is so much better than I was expecting. Length is perfect. I am 5 ft 9. Not too short, not too long. Will be buying in another color.
Love love love this tank. The fabric is lightweight and comfortable. This looks great casual or dressed up. I love how flattering it is. Will probably buy more.
Thin material, breathable and looks cute with leggings or shorts I use it for the gym with just a sports bra.
You just never know on amazon. But the fabric is soft; it's a cute length, not too cropped, and very easy to wear.
Fits true to size, sits right at waist so not too short, lightweight, soft. love the color, I ordered green.
Cute top. Runs a little small but pretty much true to size...I bought a size up. It is a shorter length than I prefer but that was hard to tell from pics. Thinner than I expected, but soft.

评论概述: TTS  and not too low cut in arms
评论详情: This fits true to size and the armpit holes are not too big. The length of it fits good for me and I am 5 foot nine. Comes in many colors.
Very cute. True to size. I usually wear a Medium and it fit perfectly. I bought the black but may buy in other colors as I like it so much.

I bought the M and it fit but exchanged for the L so it is not as short and has a little more room - especially if it shrinks a little. I am 5”5 150 lbs. This is comfortable and lightweight great for workout/walk.
Fits perfectly. Soft martial, light weight. Love the hood
This has a very boxy weird shape length is odd.

评论概述: Weird fit but color was nice
评论详情: Color was pretty, a soft dark pink. The fit was weird though, like it was too tight in the neck and I don’t have a thick neck. Not sure if sizing up when help, so I’m Returning.
Exactly as described.  True to size.  I run between sizes and went with the smaller size and it fits with plenty of room

评论概述: Love the fit of this, great for my desired gender presentation
评论详情: These tops are so comfy and sporty. They have kind of a boxy cut to them, which I love on days where I want to present a bit more androgynous/masc. The fabric they’re made of is very comfy too without being overly clingy to the chest. I will say, they’re definitely less cropped than what the product pic shows, but if you look at the pics in the product description or customer reviews you can get a good idea of length. I’d say they’re about halfway between a crop top and a regular length shirt.

I am beyond bummed. This showed up no draw string, no tags, worn in the armpit area, fuzz all over and light stains. It still smelled like someone’s perfume.  Totally grossed out. I might try to reorder another one because it really is a cute top.
True to color and cute

Bought this for st Patrick’s day to workout in, it’s comfortable and true to size, I bought size large in the dark green and a size XL in the highlighter green/yellow (not pictured). The XL is definitely a bit more flowy. They are cut off right at the waist so they’re pretty short. If you don’t mind that though I suggest getting this top!
My husband says it was cute. Good quality. I love it. Good for summer time.

评论概述: Cute shirt to layer or wear alone
评论详情: I love this little shirt. It's winter here, so I have mainly worn it over a long-sleeve shirt so far, but I can definitely see myself wearing it in the warmer weather with a tank or sports bra under it. The arm holes are a little wide in the size I ordered to wear it with nothing underneath. This shirt is light fabric which is cool enough to layer or for the summer heat. It's also soft and a little short - which is awesome for someone like me who is 5'1"!
I have ordered several colors in this top! Love it for working out!! Or as a coverup after workout! Also use under sweaters for hoodie look! LOVE this top!!

评论概述: Love the shirt but runs small!!
评论详情: Ordered a 2X and it fits my roommate who wears a small to medium
Good workout shirt cute however the price point is a little high for this .
Fits perfectly. Love the color and length

I ordered this assuming it was gonna fit like a normal tank… it was like a longer crop top… (which I’m not a huge fan of) I am 5”5” with a normal length torso and around 160 lbs it fit great but was shorter than I like… I’m gonna reorder a large and see if I like it more!

Item is definitely very cute and sporty. Color is more of a light teal than army green. I purchased a medium based on other reviews, but could have purchased a small. Length is perfect (not too short or too long), roomy enough without being too loose. It is a little bigger in the arm holes than I thought it would be, but I still really like it. I would purchase again.
I love the bright pink color and the softness of the material. The only downside is that it's pretty short in length. It's almost a crop top. I got the L/XL and it fits perfectly except the length.
Lightweight, durable and soft. The hood is great for light rain.
The colour is exactly how I thought it would be, and the fit is a little loose in a comfy way. It is a little short in the torso, but not quite a crop top. Overall a very nice top.
If you want a relaxed look size up. I normally wear a small and its a bit snug…
Love the style of this workout top! You can wear different types of sports bra underneath. Material is soft and feels cool against your skin! Also cut to wear as non worktop! Highly recommend!
I wear it on repeat!

评论概述: It's short, especially if you are busty.
评论详情: So, these are super comfy and I wear them a lot... as lounge wear. They are far too short on me to wear out. I have a rather large chest and a long torso so I don't think that's doing me any favors. It's super roomy and boxy, I just wish it were about 6" longer.

评论概述: A little small but not too bad
评论详情: It’s fine for working out but it’s kind of small and cheap. But it was a cheap price so I expected that part

Love the neon color - love the fit (fits perfectly) - I bought a large - I am 5'2 160lbs and its fits great even with some loose material - I prefer a little bit loose not a tight fit over my sports bra when working out - the fabric is soft and breathable and the price is very reasonable - enjoy - happy shopping :)
Cute top but disappointed with the quality. Arrived with a hole.
Shirt is soft and comfortable and falls just below my belly button which is great since I’m 5’2”.

I’m obsessed with this and am about to buy more! The color is true to what is shown in the product listing (the lighting in my photo isn’t good, I’m sorry). I’m 5’3” and typically wear a small, but I’m glad I got a medium because it doesn’t cling! It isn’t cropped on me. Probably my favorite top I’ve gotten in ages! Will be great for workouts, hiking, and with jeans!

I am 5'3, about 150lbs. Usually I wear a size M so when I heard these were a bit on the small side, I purposely went a size larger. The shirt was laughably short. Good luck raising your arms or bending over while you're working out, because you're going to be showing a lot of skin! Maybe that's what some people want, but I just want a shirt that fits and keeps the pervs away. I recommend that if you do purchase this product, go up 2 sizes unless you're incredibly petite.
Short wasted for sure

评论概述: I want one in every color
评论详情: I am 32/34 D cup usually wear medium in all shirts. This I bought in medium and it was perfect! The color is as shown and very quality material. I wore a sports bra under just for comfort and paired it with a cute capri jogger pant. It is so soft and comfy.
Size is wrong.
